description:
With Makarov off the battlefield, Fairy Tail had no choice but to withdraw! Natsu and the others try to cheer up Lucy now that she realizes Phantom Lord`s goal was capturing her. Phantom Lord comes to strike the final blow, using their guild itself! And Jose tries to use the Magic Focusing Cannon, Jupiter, to erase Fairy Tail completely! Do Natsu and the others have any way to withstand the onslaught?
Source: crunchyroll
